rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a reception area incorporating Art Deco elements such as geometric patterns and rich materials.
Lounge area featuring bold curves, chrome finishes, and vibrant colors in the Art Deco style, serving as the central hub of social activities.
Elegant dining space with Art Deco motifs and decorative lighting fixtures that emphasize vertical lines and symmetry.
Functional kitchen design incorporating modern appliances set within Art Deco detailing such as chrome accents and geometric patterns.
An immersive entertainment space with acoustics optimized for soundproofing, designed in an Art Deco style with luxurious finishes.

openings.description: Main entrance door placed on the north facade as per Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Large window to allow abundant natural light and maintain balance in accordance with local norms.
Smaller windows placed strategically on the west facade for cross ventilation while maintaining aesthetic symmetry.
